page.title: 15HEALTH
page.content: {HEALTH IN PORTISHEAD WE HAVE HEALTH VISTORS. THEY COME ROUND TO GIVE BABIES INJECTIONS. BABY BOYS HAVE MORE INJECTIONS THAN BABY GIRLS. MOST PEOPLE GET MORE COUGHS AND COLDS THAN ANY OTHER ILLNESS. IF SOMEONE FALLS SERIOUSLY ILL IN THE HEALTH CENTRE THEY HAVE A NURSE FROM THE HOSPITAL THERE. {FIRST DENTIST INTERVIEW 7 OUT OF 10 PEOPLE REGULARLY GO TO THE DENTIST. ABOUT 70% OF PEOPLE HAVE HEALTHY TEETH. THE MOST DIFFICULT THING A DENTIST CAN DO IS TAKE A WISDOM TOOTH OUT. MOST PEOPLE HAVE THERE WISDOM TEETH TAKEN OUT BETWEEN THE AGES OF 18_25.IF YOU HAVE TOOTH ACHE GO AND VISIT YOUR DENTIST.
